sources.title: FATTY AND MABEL'S SIMPLE LIFE (1915)
sources.description: FATTY AND MABEL'S SIMPLE LIFE Keystone-Mutual 2 reels, rel. Jan. 18, 1915 (The Runaway Auto) dir. Roscoe Arbuckle cast: Mabel Normand, Roscoe Arbuckle, Al St. John, Joe Swickard, Hank Mann finished: 1/4/1915 Location: Keystone, farm in Los Angeles, CA copyright: Jan. 16, 1915

metadata.Plot: Fatty is a farm hand at Mabel's father's place. He and Mabel love each other, but dad wants to marry Mabel off to the landowner's son in exchange for tearing up the mortgage. When Mabel and Fatty find out dad's plan, they elope, pursued by dad, the hopeful suitor, and the local constables.
metadata.Actors: Roscoe 'Fatty' Arbuckle, Mabel Normand, Al St. John
